positive.review: 一款三国志13+太阁立志传的出色集大成之作。中国人终于有自己的“三国”策略游戏了。

Turn on: No War.
You instantly get a perfect Three Kingdom RPG.
best game ever for three kingdoms series
greate game
ok

Honestly way better than every KOEI game . Appreciate these devs for making this phenomenal game . 

Hope they add official english language support tho .

Great game. Variety in the game play loop is fun. It's not perfect but cannot complain for the price and all the excellent parts of the game. English language option would be helpful. The mod pretty is good though. Looking forward to see what 1.0 will look like too.
Awesome game. Can use mod to translate the written words to English. Highly recommend this game to anyone.
一款三国志13+太阁立志传的出色集大成之作。中国人终于有自己的“三国”策略游戏了。

Great game better then later Koei games. 

Winnie the Poo would be proud.
여기서 계속 업데이트 해준다면 코에이 삼국지를 다시 하는 일은 없음

Game is quite similar to SIM CITY in Three kingdom style, the learning curve is actually on figuring out the strong cards to be equip on. There are some guides in the steam community, and you can check the strongest characters in edit character mode on the cards they have equipped. 

Game is pretty fun until you figure out most of the important things (cards to equip, allies characters to become advisors & general for you, getting the game currency to build up and etc). By 40-60 hours you get bored, but I guess for $20 that is good value.
Amazing game, better than every ROTK game out there. Shame there isn't an official English translation, but im holding out hope for the future.

Turn on: No War.
You instantly get a perfect Three Kingdom RPG.
best game ever for three kingdoms series
greate game
Good
If you like play a role in three kingdoms, this game is very awesome!
i prefer this one than rotk 8 remake.
ok

Honestly way better than every KOEI game . Appreciate these devs for making this phenomenal game . 

Hope they add official english language support tho .
